cause.description:
we want to save the black race one ignorant black person at a time,it starts with youth, you youngins think yall are da shit and know everything,but u dont,ur just a bunch of ignorant black kids who arent makin it any better for the next generation. pay attention to wuts happening in the black community anywhere and anytime instead of turnin ur backs thinkin it has nothin to do with you. i got news for ya,it does
1. spread knowledge amongst black people
2. destroy ignorance among black people
3. eliminate dependance on the white man
cause.name: Bill Cosby's Save-A-Race
